keys: El ensanchar de la unión europea
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>16100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Switzerland and the European Union</string>
            <string language="fr">La Suisse et l'Union Européenne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schweiz und der europäische Anschluß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Switzerland e a união européia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Svizzera e Unione Europea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελβετία και η Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Suiza y la unión europea</string>
          </title>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A quiz to learn and understand the original bonds which bind this landlocked country to the heart of the European Union.</string>
            <string language="fr">Un quiz pour apprendre et comprendre les liens originaux qui lient ce pays enclavé au coeur de l'Union Européenne.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Widening of the European Union</string>
            <string language="fr">Elargissement Union Européenne</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Quiz, zum der Vorlage zu erlernen und zu 
verstehen bindet ab, die dieses landumschlossene Land an das Innere 
des europäischen Anschlußes binden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um quiz para aprender e compreender o original 
liga-se que ligam este país landlocked ao coração da união 
européia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un quiz per imparare e capire l'originale lega 
che legano questo paese senza littorale al cuore di Unione Europea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας διαγωνισμός γνώσεων για να μάθει και να 
καταλάβει τους αρχικούς δεσμούς που δεσμεύουν αυτήν την 
περιβαλλόμενη από ξηρά χώρα στην καρδιά της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un concurso para aprender y para entender la 
original pega que atan este país sin mar al corazón de la unión 
europea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbreitern des europäischen Anschlußes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alargar-se da união européia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allargamento di Unione Europea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεύρυνση της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ensanchar de la unión europea</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A small quiz to be done during the lesson about Europe. The example of Switzerland is very interesting, because so close and landlocked in Europe, it remains a model of democracy which remains reticent to adhering to Europe</string>
            <string language="fr">Un petit quiz à faire pendant la leçon sur l'Europe. L'exemple de la Suisse est intéressant, car très proche et enclavée en Europe, elle reste un modèle de démocratie qui reste réticent à adhérer à l'Europe...</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
